segments.text: How can we develop a new brand image with no direction whatsoever ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: With the fifty forwards he sent out today , maybe we'll inadvertently get inspired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess this is a good excuse to surf the Net on someone else's dime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who'd have thought Bean would be this kind of e-mail fanatic ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He must have just got online for the first time last week . He still thinks it's some kind of new toy .
segments.speaker: S1
